title: Hotel Booking Cancellation Prediction
description: Built a classification model on 119,000+ records using Random Forest and Gradient Boosting to predict cancellations. Optimized model performance using GridSearchCV.

title: Olympics History Data Analysis
description: Analysed 270,000+ athlete records using advanced SQL queries (Joins, CTEs, Window Functions) to identify performance trends.

title: Smart Timetable Generator
description: Developed an automated scheduling system using Genetic Algorithms to resolve NP-hard constraint conflicts, increasing efficiency by 40%.
